words.id: Haa miim
words.en: Ha Meem

translations.text: Haa-Meeem

words.id: turunnya||kitab||dari||Allah||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: (The) revelation||(of) the Book||(is) from||Allah||the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil Azeezil Hakeem

words.id: sesungguhnya||pada||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||benar-benar terdapat tanda-tanda||bagi orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: Indeed||in||the heavens||and the earth||surely (are) Signs||for the believers

translations.text: innaa fis samaawaati wal-ardi la-Aayaatil lilmu'mineen

words.id: dan pada||menciptakan kalian||dan apa yang||bertebaran||dari||binatang ternak||tanda-tanda||bagi kaum||mereka meyakini
words.en: And in||your creation||and what||He disperses||of||(the) moving creatures||(are) Signs||for a people||who are certain

translations.text: Wa-fee khalaqikum Wa-maa yabussu min daaabbatin Aayaatul liqawmien yooqinoon

words.id: dan pergantian||malam||dan siang||dan apa yang||diturunkan||Allah||dari||langit||dari||rezeki||lalu Dia menghidupkan||dengannya||bumi||sesudah||matinya||dan perkisaran||angin||tanda-tanda||bagi kaum||mereka berakal
words.en: And (in the) alternation||(of) the night||and the day||and what||Allah sends down||Allah sends down||from||the sky||of||(the) provision||and gives life||thereby||(to) the earth||after||its death||and (in) directing of||(the) winds||(are) Signs||for a people||who reason

translations.text: Wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari Wa-maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mir rizqin fa-ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa Wa-tasreefir riyaahi Aayaatul liqawminy ya'qiloon

words.id: itulah||ayat-ayat||Allah||Kami bacakan||atas kamu||dengan benar||maka dengan yang mana||perkataan||sesudah||Allah||dan ayat-ayat-Nya||mereka beriman
words.en: These||(are the) Verses||(of) Allah||We recite them||to you||in truth||Then in what||statement||after||Allah||and His Verses||will they believe

translations.text: Tilka Aayatul laahi natloohaa alaika bil-haqq, fabiayyi hadeesim ba'dal laahi Wa-Aayaatihee yu'minoon

words.id: kecelakaanlah||bagi tiap-tiap||banyak berdusta||berdosa
words.en: Woe||to every||liar||sinful

translations.text: Wailul likulli affaakin aseem

words.id: dia mendengar||ayat-ayat||Allah||dibacakan||atasnya||kemudian||dia tetap||menyombongkan diri||seakan-akan||tidak||dia mendengar||maka beri kabar gembira||dengan azab||pedih
words.en: Who hears||(the) Verses||(of) Allah||recited||to him||then||persists||arrogantly||as if||not||he heard them||So give him tidings||(of) a punishment||painful

translations.text: Yasma'u Aayaatil laahi tutlaa alaihi summa yusirru mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa fabashshirhu bi'azaabin aleem

words.id: dan apabila||dia mengetahui||dari||ayat-ayat Kami||sesuatu||dia menjadikannya||ejekan||mereka itu||bagi mereka||azab||menghinakan
words.en: And when||he knows||of||Our Verses||anything||he takes them||(in) ridicule||Those||for them||(is) a punishment||humiliating

translations.text: Wa-izaa alima min Aayaatinaa shai'-'anit takhazahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

words.id: dari||belakang mereka||neraka jahanam||dan tidak||berguna||dari mereka||apa-apa||yang mereka kerjakan||sesuatu||dan tidak||apa yang||mereka jadikan||dari||selain||Allah||penolong||dan bagi mereka||azab||besar
words.en: Before them||Before them||(is) Hell||and not||will avail||them||what||they had earned||anything||and not||what||they had taken||besides||besides||Allah||(as) protectors||And for them||(is) a punishment||great

translations.text: Minw waraaa'ihim Jahannamu Wa-laa yughnee 'anhum maa kasaboo shai'anw Wa-laa mat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa; Wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

words.id: ini||petunjuk||dan orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||terhadap ayat-ayat||Tuhan mereka||bagi mereka||azab||dari||siksaan||pedih
words.en: This||(is) guidance||And those who||disbelieve||in (the) Verses||(of) their Lord||for them||(is) a punishment||of||filth||painful

translations.text: Haazaa hudaa; wal-lazeena kafaroo bi-aayaati Rabbihim lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin 'aleem

words.id: Allah||yang||menundukkan||bagi kalian||lautan||supaya berlayar||perahu||di dalamnya/padanya||dengan perintah-Nya||dan supaya kamu mencari||dari||karunia-Nya||dan supaya kamu||kalian bersyukur
words.en: Allah||(is) the One Who||subjected||to you||the sea||that may sail||the ships||therein||by His Command||and that you may seek||of||His Bounty||and that you may||give thanks

translations.text: Allaahul lazee sahkhara lakumul bahra litajriyal fulku feehi bi-amrihee Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

words.id: dan Dia menundukkan||bagi kalian||apa yang||di||langit(jamak)||dan apa yang||di||bumi||semuanya||dari pada-Nya||sesungguhnya||pada yang||demikian itu||benar-benar terdapat tanda-tanda||bagi kaum||mereka berfikir
words.en: And He has subjected||to you||whatever||(is) in||the heavens||and whatever||(is) in||the earth||all||from Him||Indeed||in||that||surely are Signs||for a people||who give thought

translations.text: Wa-sakhkhara lakum maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi jamee'am minhu; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon

words.id: katakanlah||kepada orang-orang yang||beriman||mereka memaafkan||kepada orang-orang yang||tidak||mereka mengharap||hari-hari||Allah||untuk Dia memberi balasan||kaum||terhadap apa||adalah mereka||mereka kerjakan
words.en: Say||to those who||believe||(to) forgive||those who||(do) not||hope||(for the) days||(of) Allah||that He may recompense||a people||for what||they used (to)||earn

translations.text: Qul lillazeena aamanoo yaghfiroo lillazeena laa yarjoona ayyaamal laahi liyajziya qawmam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

words.id: barang siapa||berbuat||kebaikan||maka untuk dirinya sendiri||dan barang siapa||berbuat kejahatan||maka atasnya||kemudian||kepada||Tuhan kalian||kalian dikembalikan
words.en: Whoever||does||a righteous deed||then it is for his soul||and whoever||does evil||then it (is) against it||Then||to||your Lord||you will be returned

translations.text: Man amila saalihan falinafsihee Wa-man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa summa ilaa Rabbikum turja'oon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||telah Kami berikan||Bani||Israil||Al kitab||dan hukkum-hukum||dan kenabian||dan Kami berikan mereka rezeki||dari||yang baik-baik||dan Kami lebihkan mereka||atas||alam semesta
words.en: And certainly||We gave||(the) Children of Israel||(the) Children of Israel||the Book||and the wisdom||and the Prophethood||and We provided them||of||the good things||and We preferred them||over||the worlds

translations.text: Wa-laqad aatainaa Baneee israaa'eelal Kitaaba walhukma wan-Nubuwwata Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati Wa-faddalnaahum; alal 'aalameen

words.id: dan Kami berikan kepada mereka||keterangan-keterangan||dari||urusan||maka tidak||mereka perselisihkan||kecuali||dari||sesudah||apa||datang kepada mereka||ilmu pengetahuan||kedengkian||diantara mereka||sesungguhnya||Tuhanmu||Dia akan memutuskan||diantara mereka||hari||kiamat||tentang apa||adalah mereka||didalamnya||mereka perselisihkan
words.en: And We gave them||clear proofs||of||the matter||And not||they differed||except||after||after||[what]||came to them||the knowledge||(out of) envy||between themselves||Indeed||your Lord||will judge||between them||(on the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||about what||they used (to)||therein||differ

translations.text: Wa-aatainaahum baiyinaatim minal amri famakh talafooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul ilmu baghyam bainahum; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

words.id: kemudian||Kami jadikan kamu||atas||suatu syari'at||dari||urusan itu||maka ikutilah ia||dan jangan||kamu mengikuti||keinginan||orang-orang yang||tidak||mereka mengetahui
words.en: Then||We put you||on||an ordained way||of||the matter||so follow it||and (do) not||follow||(the) desires||(of) those who||(do) not||know

translations.text: Summa ja'alnaaka 'alaa sharee'atim minal amri fattabi'haa Wa-laa tattabi' ahwaaa' al-lazeena laa ya'lamoon

words.id: sesungguhnya mereka||tidak||mereka dapat menolak||dari kamu||dari||Allah||sedikit||dan sesungguhnya||orang-orang ynag zalim||sebagian mereka||penolong/pelindung||sebagian||dan Allah||penolong/pelindung||orang-orang yang bertakwa
words.en: Indeed they||never||will avail||you||against||Allah||(in) anything||And indeed||the wrongdoers||some of them||(are) allies||(of) others||and Allah||(is the) Protector||(of) the righteous

translations.text: innahum laien yughnoo 'anka minal laahi shai'aa; Wa-innaz zaalimeena ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'dinw wallaahu waliyyul muttaqeen

words.id: ini||pedoman||bagi manusia||dan petunjuk||dan rahmat||bagi kaum||mereka meyakini
words.en: This||(is) enlightenment||for mankind||and guidance||and mercy||for a people||who are certain

translations.text: Haazaa basaaa'iru linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatul liqawmien yooqinoon

words.id: ataukah/apakah||mengira||orang-orang yang||mereka berbuat||kejahatan||bahwa||Kami menjadikan mereka||seperti orang-orang yang||beriman||dan berbuat||kebaikan||sama||kehidupan mereka||dan kematian mereka||amat buruk||apa yang||mereka putuskan
words.en: Do||think||those who||commit||evil deeds||that||We will make them||like those||who believed||and did||righteous deeds||equal||(in) their life||and their death||Evil is||what||they judge

translations.text: Am hasibal lazeenaj tarahus saiyyiaati an naj'alahum kallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati sawaaa'am mahyaahum Wa-mamaatuhum; saaa'a maa yahkumoon

words.id: dan menciptakan||Allah||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dengan benar||dan untuk diberi balasan||tiap-tiap||jiwa||dengan apa||ia usahakan||dan mereka||tidak||mereka dianiaya/dirugikan
words.en: And Allah created||And Allah created||the heavens||and the earth||in truth||and that may be recompensed||every||soul||for what||it has earned||and they||will not be wronged||will not be wronged

translations.text: Wa-khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqqi Wa-litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

words.id: adakah kamu melihat||orang||ia menjadikan||Tuhannya||hawa nafsunya||dan membiarkan sesat padanya||Allah||atas||pengetahuan||dan Dia menutup||atas||pendengarannya||dan hatinya||dan Dia menjadikan||atas||penglihatannya||tutupan||maka siapakah||memberi petunjuk kepadanya||dari||sesudah||Allah||apakah maka tidak||kamu ingat/mengambil pelajaran
words.en: Have you seen||(he) who||takes||(as) his god||his desire||and Allah lets him go astray||and Allah lets him go astray||knowingly||knowingly||and He sets a seal||upon||his hearing||and his heart||and puts||over||his vision||a veil||Then who||will guide him||after||after||Allah||Then will not||you receive admonition

translations.text: Afara'ayta manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu Wa-adal-lahul laahu 'alaa ilminw Wa-khatama 'alaa sam'ihee Wa-qalbihee Wa-ja'ala 'alaa basarihee ghishaawatan famaien yahdeehi mim ba'dil laah; afalaa tazakkaroon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||tidaklah||ini||kecuali||kehidupan kami||dunia||kami mati||dan kami hidup||dan tidak||membinasakan kami||kecuali||masa||dan tidak||mereka mempunyai||tentang itu||dari||pengetahuan||tidaklah||mereka||kecuali||mereka menduga-duga
words.en: And they say||Not||it||(is) but||our life||(of) the world||we die||and we live||and not||destroys us||except||the time||And not||for them||of that||any||knowledge||not||they||(do) but||guess

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo maa hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu Wa-nahyaa Wa-maa yuhlikunaaa illad dahr; Wa-maa lahum bizaalika min ilmin in hum illaa yazunnoon

words.id: dan apabila||dibacakan||atas mereka||ayat-ayat Kami||nyata/jelas||tidak||adalah||bantahan mereka||kecuali||bahwa||mereka mengatakan||datangkanlah||dengan bapak-bapak kami||jika||kalian adalah||orang-orang yang benar
words.en: And when||are recited||to them||Our Verses||clear||not||is||their argument||except||that||they say||Bring||our forefathers||if||you are||truthful

translations.text: Wa-izaa tutlaa alaihim aayaatuna baiyinaatim maa kaana hujjatahum illaaa an qaalu' too bi-aabaaa'inaaa in kuntum saadiqeen

words.id: katakanlah||Allah||Dia menghidupkan kalian||kemudian||Dia mematikan kalian||kemudian||Dia mengumpulkan kamu||pada||hari||kiamat||tidak ada||keraguan||didalamnya||akan tetapi||kebanyakan||manusia||tidak||mereka mengetahui
words.en: Say||Allah||gives you life||then||causes you to die||then||He will gather you||to||(the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||no||doubt||about it||But||most||(of) the people||(do) not||know

translations.text: Qulil laahu yuhyeekum summa yumeetukum summa yajma'ukum ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati laa raiba feehi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

words.id: dan bagi Allah||kerajaan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan hari||terjadi||kiamat||pada hari itu||rugilah||orang-orang yang mengerjakan kebathilan
words.en: And for Allah||(is the) dominion||(of) the heavens||and the earth||and (the) Day||is established||the Hour||that Day||will lose||the falsifiers

translations.text: Wa-lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma-'izien yakhsarul mubtiloon

words.id: dan kamu lihat||tiap-tiap||ummat||berlutut||setiap||ummat||dipanggil||kepada||kitabnya/catatannya||pada hari||kamu diberi balasan||apa yang||kalian adalah||kamu kerjakan
words.en: And you will see||every||nation||kneeling||Every||nation||will be called||to||its record||Today||you will be recompensed||(for) what||you used (to)||do

translations.text: Wa-taraa kulla ummatin jaasiyah; kullu ummatin tud'aaa ilaa kitaabihaa al-Yawma tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

words.id: ini||kitab/catatan kami||ia menuturkan||atas kalian||dengan benar||sesungguhnya Kami||adalah Kami||Kami menyuruh mencatat||apa yang||kalian adalah||kamu kerjakan
words.en: This||Our Record||speaks||about you||in truth||Indeed We||[We] used (to)||transcribe||what||you used (to)||do

translations.text: Haazaa kitaabunaa yantiqu alaikum bilhaqq; innaa kunnaa nastansikhu maa kuntum ta'maloon

words.id: maka adapun||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan berbuat||kebaikan||maka memasukkan mereka||Tuhan mereka||dalam||rahmat-Nya||demikian itu||ia/itu||keuntungan||nyata
words.en: Then as for||those who||believed||and did||[the] righteous deeds||will admit them||their Lord||in(to)||His mercy||That||[it]||(is) the success||clear

translations.text: Fa-ammal lazeena aamaanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fayudkhiluhum Rabbuhum fee rahmatih; zaalika huwal fawzul mubeen

words.id: dan adapun||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||apakah belum/tidak||adalah||ayat-ayat-Ku||dibacakan||atas kalian||lalu kamu menyombngkan diri||dan kalian||kaum||orang-orang yang berdosa
words.en: But as for||those who||disbelieved||Then were not||Then were not||My Verses||recited||to you||but you were proud||and you became||a people||criminals

translations.text: Wa-ammal lazeena kafarooo afalam takun Aayaatee tutlaa alaikum fastakbartum Wa-kuntum qawmam mujrimeen

words.id: dan apabila||dikatakan||sesungguhnya||janji||Allah||benar||dan kiamat||tidak ada||keraguan||didalamnya||kamu mengatakan||tidak||kami tahu||apa||kiamat itu||tidaklah||kami mengira||kecuali||dugaan||dan tidaklah||kami||orang-orang yang meyakini
words.en: And when||it was said||indeed||(the) Promise||(of) Allah||(is) true||and the Hour||(there is) no||doubt||about it||you said||Not||we know||what||the Hour (is)||Not||we think||except||an assumption||and not||we||(are) convinced

translations.text: Wa-izaa qeela inna wa'dallaahi haqqunw was Saa'atu laa raiba feehaa qultum maa nadree mas Saa'atu in nazunnu illaa zannanw Wa-maa nahnu bimustaiqineen

words.id: dan nyata||bagi mereka||kejelekan-kejelekan||apa yang||mereka perbuat||dan meliputi||pada mereka||apa yang||mereka adalah||dengannya||mereka memperolok-olokan
words.en: And (will) appear||to them||(the) evil||(of) what||they did||and (will) envelop||them||what||they used||[at it]||(to) mock

translations.text: Wa-badaa lahum saiyyiaatu maa amiloo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

words.id: dan dikatakan||pada hari||Kami melupakan||sebagaimana||kamu melupakan||perjumpaan||harimu||ini||dan tempat tinggalmu||neraka||dan tidak ada||bagi kalian||dari||seorang penolong
words.en: And it will be said||Today||We forget you||as||you forgot||(the) meeting||(of) this Day of yours||(of) this Day of yours||and your abode||(is) the Fire||and not||for you||any||helpers

translations.text: Wa-qeelal yawma nansaakum kamaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawmikum haazaa Wa-maawaakumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min naasireen

words.id: demikian tiu||karena sesungguhnya kamu||kalian menjadikan||ayat-ayat||Allah||olok-olokan||dan telah menipu kamu||kehidupan||dunia||maka pada hari||tidak||mereka dikeluarkan||darinya(neraka)||dan tidaklah||mereka||mereka diberi kesempatan bertaubat
words.en: That||(is) because you||took||(the) Verses||(of) Allah||(in) ridicule||and deceived you||the life||(of) the world||So this Day||not||they will be brought forth||from it||and not||they||will be asked to appease

translations.text: Zaalikum bi-annakumut takhaztum aayaatil laahi huzuwanw Wa-gharratkumul hayaatud dunyaa; falyawma laa yukhrajoona minhaa Wa-laa hum yusta'taboon

words.id: maka bagi Allah||segala puji||Tuhan||langit(jamak)||dan Tuhan||Bumi||Tuhan||semesta alam
words.en: Then for Allah||(is) all the praise||(the) Lord||(of) the heavens||and (the) Lord||(of) the earth||(the) lord||(of) the worlds

translations.text: Falillaahil hamdu Rabbis samaawaati Wa-Rabbil ardi Rabbil 'aalameen

words.id: dan bagi-Nya||kebesaran||di||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan Dia||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: And for Him||(is) the greatness||in||the heavens||and the earth||and He||(is) the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: Wa-lahul kibriyaaa'u fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
